java/liquibase/change/DropForeignKeyConstraintChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.DropForeignKeyConstraintStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.ForeignKey;
00008 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00009 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00010 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00011 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00012 
00013 import java.util.HashSet;
00014 import java.util.Set;
00015 
00019 public class DropForeignKeyConstraintChange extends AbstractChange {
00020     private String baseTableSchemaName;
00021     private String baseTableName;
00022     private String constraintName;
00023 
00024     public DropForeignKeyConstraintChange() {
00025         super("dropForeignKeyConstraint", "Drop Foreign Key Constraint");
00026     }
00027 
00028     public String getBaseTableSchemaName() {
00029         return baseTableSchemaName;
00030     }
00031 
00032     public void setBaseTableSchemaName(String baseTableSchemaName) {
00033         this.baseTableSchemaName = baseTableSchemaName;
00034     }
00035 
00036     public String getBaseTableName() {
00037         return baseTableName;
00038     }
00039 
00040     public void setBaseTableName(String baseTableName) {
00041         this.baseTableName = baseTableName;
00042     }
00043 
00044     public String getConstraintName() {
00045         return constraintName;
00046     }
00047 
00048     public void setConstraintName(String constraintName) {
00049         this.constraintName = constraintName;
00050     }
00051 
00052     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00053         return new SqlStatement[]{
00054                 new DropForeignKeyConstraintStatement(
00055                         getBaseTableSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getBaseTableSchemaName(),
00056                         getBaseTableName(),
00057                         getConstraintName()),
00058         };
00059     }
00060 
00061     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00062         return "Foreign key " + getConstraintName() + " dropped";
00063     }
00064 
00065     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00066         Element node = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement(getTagName());
00067 
00068         if (getBaseTableSchemaName() != null) {
00069             node.setAttribute("baseTableSchemaName", getBaseTableSchemaName());
00070         }
00071 
00072         node.setAttribute("baseTableName", getBaseTableName());
00073         node.setAttribute("constraintName", getConstraintName());
00074 
00075         return node;
00076     }
00077 
00078     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00079         Set<DatabaseObject> returnSet = new HashSet<DatabaseObject>();
00080 
00081         Table baseTable = new Table(getBaseTableName());
00082         returnSet.add(baseTable);
00083 
00084         ForeignKey fk = new ForeignKey();
00085         fk.setName(constraintName);
00086         fk.setForeignKeyTable(baseTable);
00087         returnSet.add(fk);
00088 
00089         return returnSet;
00090 
00091     }
00092 
00093 }
